> <OLD>
>
> Tucson flashes his headlights dimly in reply.
>
> " Of course. =
But if you could, please, allow us to rest together. Knowing
that she is wi=
th me, safe from harm, only then can I rest as well."
>
> It was rather obv=
ious that his love for Talon grew ever stronger. He was
not able to show he=
r that due to being under such duress, but now, there was
time to express h=
is feelings for her. He was a bot true to his word. His
love was real, and =
it would remain as such.
>
> Straight Shot knew him well. She knew what he =
meant and that made her very
happy. Her big brother had finally found someo=
ne to be with and she only
hoped that it would lead to something more speci=
al in the future.
>
> " Aw, now how can ya refuse a request like that huh P=
erceptor? I think I
know what this means.. And I hope one day, somewhere al=
ong the line, that
they're both as happy as Rodimus and Nightlight, with a =
family of their
own."
>

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded as the others talked, taking=
 his time to look around the
room, trying to be absolutely sure that nothin=
g critical is damaged.


Outside, Hydras and his team were little more than=
 a dot in the skies as
they moved away carrying their own injured with them=
. All around the Ark
defensive shielding began to flicker into place on the=
 heels of the
Predacons and Decepticons vacating the area, weapons and guns=
 began to twist
and turn as they initialized and calibrated themselves =96 =
another Predacon
attack would not be so easy. In fact this one would not ha=
ve been if it were
not for Nightrazor sabotaging many of the Ark=92s system=
s and then the sonic
wave that Tuscon had sent out.

Even as the main syste=
ms were coming up, it would be some time before every
systems was running a=
gain as they should.

Legacy near the gigantic forms of Megatron and Optimu=
s, even in death it
seemed that these two were locked in some sort of titan=
ic struggle. He
looked around, his single optic taking in the entire vista =
and then he
turned back to Tuscon and Rodimus.

=93For the moment the time =
stream would appear undamaged.=94 Legacy pronounced.
=93However it is diffi=
cult to know the full ramifications of even these small
changes that have o=
ccurred, and if we have not inadvertently changed
something that was.=94

R=
odimus looked at Legacy, =93You=92re right.=94 Rodimus came to stand beside=

Legacy, who had himself moved towards Tuscon. =93We need to find a way to
=
secure this Ark. If it is damaged too much, or too many changes are made,
t=
hen all this that we are fighting for would be for nothing.=94

A call came=
 in from Ramulus, =93Rodimus, Tuscon, our medics are both down. I=92m
holdi=
ng them together with a med kit, but I am going to need some help down
here=
.=94 Ramulus=92 voice was calm, and yet there was still an edge of somethin=
g
in his voice: Concern? Fear? Anger?

From outside Leo II followed by Wing=
 Caliber and the Fuzors. With the battle
over, they definitely looked tired=
. Two battles in the space of a day would
definitely tax anyone=92s reserve=
s.

(TAG)

Preston

<div>> Tucson flashes hi=
s headlights dimly in reply.</div>
<div>></div>
<div>> " Of cour=
se. But if you could, please, allow us to rest together. Knowing that she i=
s with me, safe from harm, only then can I rest as well."</div>
<div>&=
gt;</div>
<div>> It was rather obvious that his love for Talon grew ever=
 stronger. He was not able to show her that due to being under such duress,=
 but now, there was time to express his feelings for her. He was a bot true=
 to his word. His love was real, and it would remain as such.</div>

<div>&=
gt;</div>
<div>> Straight Shot knew him well. She knew what he meant and=
 that made her very happy. Her big brother had finally found someone to be =
with and she only hoped that it would lead to something more special in the=
 future.</div>

<div>></div>
<div>> " Aw, now how can ya refuse =
a request like that huh Perceptor? I think I know what this means.. And I h=
ope one day, somewhere along the line, that they're both as happy as Ro=
dimus and Nightlight, with a family of their own."</div>

<div>></d=
iv>
